Description: Papyrus containing 7 lines of Greek text. The text contains a receipt for installments of a poll-tax and pig-tax.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (21895) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/21895)
Exhibition history: 2021 13 Feb-15 Aug, Belgium, Tongeren, Gallo-Romeins Museum, 'Rome; City & Empire'
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Colgate Rochester Divinity School
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.Oxy. XII 1520 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
